document.full_text: residents of the city of deraa, cradle of the pro-democracy protests that have swept syria, painted a chilling picture on monday of an assault by security forces using tanks, heavy artillery and machine guns.
document.title: residents tell grim story of assault on syrian city
lines_and_colors: residents of the city of deraa, cradle of the pro-democracy protests that have swept syria, painted a chilling picture on monday of an assault by security forces using tanks, heavy artillery and machine guns.
